wiki.content: The Madness Songfacts explains the song was inspired by an incident when a humbled Matt Bellamy had to go cap in hand to Goldie Hawn's house, after having a fight with his girlfriend Kate Hudson. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The Madness Songfacts explains the song was inspired by an incident when a humbled Matt Bellamy had to go cap in hand to Goldie Hawn's house, after having a fight with his girlfriend Kate Hudson.

track.name: Madness
comments: I am ma ma ma ma ma mad mad about this song!!!!!
I love Muse, but this song is abominable. Even Undisclosed Desires is a masterpiece compared to this
This song is perfect. I love it. <3
Excelente canción, es raro The 2nd Law, empieza jodidamente maravilloso y va cayendo de a poco, la segunda parte del disco ya es aburrida.
The 2nd Law is a good album.
Ou apenas lamentar por essa música existir.
Talvez eu até quisesse vivê-las novamente...
Essa música me traz boas memórias de acontecimentos que tive em minha vida ;'((
When Matthew screaming "I need to love" ,,, this drives me MADNESS
@minoesj:  you're right! yes i know, he can be wrong, maybe he's headstrong hehe
i love muse, and everything that they make, they are wonderfull! i love them!
I can't understand why this song is on top of the chart... For me this song doesn't show soul of band.
i think muse is one of the best bands :)
